tools.name: generate_image
tools.description: Generates an image based on a text prompt with specified dimensions
tools.version_description: Image generation tool with custom dimensions

prompt.description: The prompt of the image to generate.

width.description: The width of the image in pixels.

height.description: The height of the image in pixels.

tools.name: generate_video
tools.description: Generates a video based on a text prompt with specified duration
tools.version_description: Video generation tool with custom duration

prompt.description: The prompt of the video to generate.

duration.description: The duration of the video in seconds.
